text: Pub rock is a rock music genre that developed in the mid-1970s in the United Kingdom and Ireland. Pub rock was a reaction against progressive and glam rock. Pub rock was short-lived, but it helped return live rock to small pubs and clubs. Its basic style of playing inspired the British punk rock scene. ==Related pages== * Garage rock ==References== This article contains material from the English Wikipedia. Category:Rock music
title: Pub rock (UK)
